tern-package

TLG creation functions

Tables

t_forest_rsp

Response Forest Plot Table

t_forest_tte

Time-to-event Forest Plot Table

Response Table Caclulation Function

t_summarize_variables

Table of Variable Summaries

t_tte

Time to Event Table

chgfbl_table

Wrap data generated from chgfbl_data into rtable format, to create a test result and change from baseline by visit summary table

Plots

g_forest

Forest plot

g_km

Kaplan-Meier Plot using grid plotting

chgfbl_plot

Plotting data generated from chgfbl_data into change from baseline mean plot using ggplot2 and gridExtra

Data Helper Functions

these functions are used by other functions to derive data

chgfbl_data

Change from Baseline Table Caclulation Function
